subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Carl Edwards got the jump on Jimmie Johnson in qualifying for the Nascar Sprint Cup finale at Homestead-Miami Speedway. Edwards, facing a 141-point deficit heading into Sunday’s Ford 400, qualified fourth, trailing the first-time pole-winner David Reutimann, the rookie Scott Speed and his Roush Fenway Racing teammate Matt Kenseth.
